name: Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects (formal name); MPEG-4, Advanced Video Coding (part 10), High Profile.
definition: The High Profile supports 4:2:0 chroma at 8 bits per channel, adaptive macroblock-level switching between 8x8 and 4x4 transform block size, encoder-specified quantization scaling matrices, encoder-specified separate control of the quantization parameter for each chroma component, and monochrome sequences.
